resources.string: Do you know that you can pull down to start the check in process.
Seems like your haven\'t checked in yet. Please pull down to start.
Please check for update regularly to have all the new features.
If you have any suggestion please contact us.

string-array.item: ic_profile:: Omar Allaham:: Software Engineed:: Stackoverflow: http://stackoverflow.com/users/6689101/zombie:: Stackoverflow: http://stackoverflow.com/users/6689101/zombie

:: February/2015 - Present:: Mobile app developer at Konsole-Labs:: Build native mobile apps using Java, Swift and Objective-c:: DAB+ application:: Breaking push (DW TV. is one of our customers):: https://www.konsole-labs.com
:: December/2014 - December/2014:: One mouth internship at the foreigner office in Pirna:: Hardware delivery:: Cabling and installing a network:: Contact: Thomas.Kirsten@landratsamt-pirna.de

:: December/2014 - February/2016:: Volunteer at AWO and also at JMD in Pirna near Dresden:: German, English and Arabic interpreting and translating:: Contact: n.karsten@diakonie-pirna.de:: Contact: migration@awo-sonnenstein.de

:: December/2012 - October/2013:: Technical engineer at the Dalal-Steel Company in Beirut, Lebanon:: Company for the production and assembly of steel structures - drawings for buildings with AutoCAD:: Customer advice: Software and hardware installation and troubleshooting

:: October/2011 - December/2012:: Software developer at Perfect Systems in Damascus, Syria:: Storage management program with C # and LINQ:: Hotel reservation system with ASP.NET and MySQL:: Some website "e-commerce" with joomla and MySQL:: Medical record System for Al-Faranci Hospital in Damascus
:: September/2011 - December/2011:: Internship at Sa3eed in Damascus, Syria:: Software design using Blend & Visual Studio
:: September/2008 - September/2012:: Software Engineering in Daara, Syria at the International University for Science and Technology:: Link: http://iust.edu.sy/en/
:: September/2007 - October/2008:: Civil Engineering in Damascus University in Syria
